casebody.data:
Andre Lee COLEMAN, aka Andre Lee Coleman-Bey, petitioner,
v.
Todd TOLLEFSON, et al.; Andre Lee Coleman, aka Andre Lee Coleman-Bey, petitioner,
v.
Bertina Bowerman, et al.; Andre Lee Coleman, aka Andre Lee Coleman-Bey, petitioner,
v.
Steven Dykehouse, et al.; and Andre Lee Coleman, aka Andre Lee Coleman-Bey, petitioner,
v.
Aaron J. Vroman, et al. No. 13-1333. Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 20, 2015.

Opinion

Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
